import{createApi,fetchBaseQuery}from"@reduxjs/toolkit/query/react";var tmdbApiKey=process.env.REACT_APP_TMDB_KEY;//https://api.themoviedb.org/3/movie/popular?api_key=<<api_key>>&language=en-US&page=1
export var tmdbApi=createApi({reducerPath:"tmdbApi",baseQuery:fetchBaseQuery({baseUrl:"https://api.themoviedb.org/3"}),endpoints:function endpoints(builder){return{//Get Genres
getGenres:builder.query({query:function query(){return"/genre/movie/list?api_key=".concat(tmdbApiKey);}}),//get Movies by type
getMovies:builder.query({query:function query(_ref){var genreIdOrCategoryName=_ref.genreIdOrCategoryName,page=_ref.page,searchQuery=_ref.searchQuery;//get movies by search
if(searchQuery){return"/search/movie?query=".concat(searchQuery,"&page=").concat(page,"&api_key=").concat(tmdbApiKey);}//get movies by category as category return string
if(genreIdOrCategoryName&&typeof genreIdOrCategoryName==="string"){return"movie/".concat(genreIdOrCategoryName,"?page=").concat(page,"&api_key=").concat(tmdbApiKey);}//get movie by genre as genre is a number
if(genreIdOrCategoryName&&typeof genreIdOrCategoryName==="number"){return"discover/movie?with_genres=".concat(genreIdOrCategoryName,"&page=").concat(page,"&api_key=").concat(tmdbApiKey);}//get popular movies
return"movie/popular?page=".concat(page,"&api_key=").concat(tmdbApiKey);}}),//Get Movie
getMovie:builder.query({query:function query(id){return"/movie/".concat(id,"?append_to_response=videos,credits&api_key=").concat(tmdbApiKey);}}),//Get User Specific Lists
getList:builder.query({query:function query(_ref2){var listName=_ref2.listName,accountId=_ref2.accountId,sessionId=_ref2.sessionId,page=_ref2.page;return"/account/".concat(accountId,"/").concat(listName,"?api_key=").concat(tmdbApiKey,"&session_id=").concat(sessionId,"&page=").concat(page);}}),//get user Specific Lists
getRecommendations:builder.query({query:function query(_ref3){var movie_id=_ref3.movie_id,list=_ref3.list;return"/movie/".concat(movie_id,"/").concat(list,"?api_key=").concat(tmdbApiKey);}}),getActorsDetails:builder.query({query:function query(id){return"person/".concat(id,"?api_key=").concat(tmdbApiKey);}}),getMoviesByActorId:builder.query({query:function query(_ref4){var id=_ref4.id,page=_ref4.page;return"/discover/movie?with_cast=".concat(id,"&page=").concat(page,"&api_key=").concat(tmdbApiKey);}})};}});var useGetMoviesQuery=tmdbApi.useGetMoviesQuery,useGetGenresQuery=tmdbApi.useGetGenresQuery,useGetMovieQuery=tmdbApi.useGetMovieQuery,useGetRecommendationsQuery=tmdbApi.useGetRecommendationsQuery,useGetActorsDetailsQuery=tmdbApi.useGetActorsDetailsQuery,useGetMoviesByActorIdQuery=tmdbApi.useGetMoviesByActorIdQuery,useGetListQuery=tmdbApi.useGetListQuery;export{useGetMoviesQuery,useGetGenresQuery,useGetMovieQuery,useGetRecommendationsQuery,useGetActorsDetailsQuery,useGetMoviesByActorIdQuery,useGetListQuery};
